name: Simple Account Manager
author: Horsera
description: A simple module for registering, and using accounts. Changing password is also supported.

name: Community posts
author: Horsera
description: A Wall with likeable posts that users can add. Posts are sorted by their likes divided by how many seconds ago they were posted.

name: Messaging
author: Horsera
description: Allows users to send direct messages between each other. It still looks like e-mail, but it will be updated to look like most modern messaging apps.

name: Follow List
author: Horsera
description: Allows users to follow other users. For example, if the community posts module detects that followlists are installed, it will add a filter to see only the people who you follow.

name: Biographies
author: Horsera
description: Allows users to have a biography for their account, and see other biographies. It is intended to be used with other modules.

name: File repository
author: Horsera
description: Allows the administrator to post files that can be downloaded by anyone visiting the site. It is useless because you can use your web server.
